control

Class CompressionControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.CompressionControl

  • class CompressionControl
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class for the compression of a HyperGraph Object. This class implements a grammar based compression method for graphs. The graph must be an HyperGraph Object. Then the class can execute the compression and produce a compressed HyperGraph with its applied digrams.
    Author:
    Matthias DÃ¼rksen
    See Also:
    HyperGraph

      • addCurrentGraph

        private void addCurrentGraph(HyperGraph graph,
                             java.util.LinkedList<Digram> digrams)
        add a graph and its applied digrams to the intermediate results.
        Parameters:
        graph - the current graph for the compression interstate.
        digrams - the current digrams for the compression interstate.

      • graphCompression

        public java.util.LinkedList<Tuple<HyperGraph,java.util.LinkedList<Digram>>> graphCompression(HyperGraph untransformedGraph)
        Execution of the whole grammar based compression method.
        Parameters:
        untransformedGraph - an uncompressed graph.
        Returns:
        all intermediate compression results and thus also the compressed graph.

      • transformGraph

        private HyperGraph transformGraph(HyperGraph untransformedGraph)
        Trasformation of the uncompressed graph to another graph model. The graph is transformed to a graph which has no hyperedge and no edge labels. This is realized by transforming the graph in such a way that all incident elements become adjacent elements.
        Parameters:
        untransformedGraph - the untransformed graph.
        Returns:
        the transformed graph.

      • findAllDigram

        private void findAllDigram(HyperGraph graph)
        This method finds all active basic digrams of a graph and stores them in the DigramList.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which the digrams will be captured.

      • getNecessaryLabels

        private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getNecessaryLabels(HyperGraph graph)
        This method finds all labels in the graph which are necessary for the compression. A label is called necessary iff the label occurs at least twice in the graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which the method will be executed.
        Returns:
        all necessary different labels.

      • checkAndAddEdgeToDigram

        private void checkAndAddEdgeToDigram(SimpleEdge edge)
        This method checks if the edge overlaps with a digram and perhaps adds a new digram. This method checks whether the corresponding occurrence in the digram contains some of the incident nodes of the edge. If the digram does not contain some of the node, an occurrence for the edge is added to the corresponding digram.
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge for which the method will be executed.

      • replaceNextDigrams

        private void replaceNextDigrams(HyperGraph graph,
                                Digram digram)
        This method replaces all associated digrams of the digram in the graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which the method will be executed.
        digram - the digram for which the method will be executed.

      • updateDigramList

        private void updateDigramList(HyperGraph graph,
                              Digram appliedDigram)
        This method updates the digramlist for the applied digram. After applying the digram the digramlist must be adjusted. This is done by this method.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which the method will be executed.
        appliedDigram - the digram for which the method will be executed.

      • pruning

        private void pruning(HyperGraph graph,
                     java.util.LinkedList<Digram> digrams)
        For the applied digrams it is checked whether the digrams can be represented more efficiently. If a digram d is not contained in the graph and only once in one digram s, the digram d will be inlined in the digram s.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which the method will be executed.
        digrams - the digrams for which the method will be executed.

      • edgeOptimization

        private HyperGraph edgeOptimization(HyperGraph graph)
        This method optimizes the number of elements by replacing two edges with an incedent node to a new edge with a label.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which the method will be executed.
        Returns:
        the optimized graph.

      • checkCorrectDirection

        private boolean checkCorrectDirection(java.util.LinkedList<SimpleEdge> edges,
                                      GraphNode node)
        Checks if two edges are incident to the node and one is an incoming edge and the other one is an outgoing edge.
        Parameters:
        edges - the edges for which the method will be executed.
        node - the node for which the method will be executed.
        Returns:
        true if the edges are both incident to the node an one is an incoming and the other one is an outgoing edge, else false.

      • getNTOccurrencesDigram

        private Tuple<Digram,java.lang.Integer> getNTOccurrencesDigram(java.lang.String nt)
        Counts how often the label is contained in the digrams.
        Parameters:
        nt - the label for which the method will be executed.
        Returns:
        the number of occurrences in all digrams.
